title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: January 10, 2023, 05:50:09 AMLast edit: January 20, 2023, 06:01:38 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: hello!Ballet has informed me of a conference "Bitcoin Day" happening in Naples, FL on January 27th, Attendees of the conference will get one of these wallets with their entry - these will not be sold online in the Ballet Store.As usual, I have been given an allotment to sell here on the forums.Please list you name and qty desiredexample: MoparMiningLLC - 2cost: $35 ea shipping: there is no charge for the shipment to me, shipment to you depends on qty, location and carrier preference. Can also be consolidated with minerjones or myself.I have been allotted 20 guaranteed. If we go over that, please hold pymt until I confirm I can get additional.Accepted forms of payment:BTC: 1FGTHoXtr6X9PVm5qJpa9DbdZFpAGLAa8G or bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esStrike: strike.me/moparminingllcLightning: let me know and I will send you an LN invoicePlease note: I cannot take CASHAPP, VENMO or PayPal any longer. If you wish to pay with fiat, I suggest signing up for Strike - let me know and I can send you a referral code as well (I think you get $5 for using it)
